    • Method Detail

      • calculateRunningStatistics

        public RunningStatistics calculateRunningStatistics(IntervalQueryParams params)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        This calculates summary statistics based on the provided IntervalQueryParams object. The statistics are accessed via the return RunningStatistics object.
        Parameters:
        params - Specify the details of the query
        Returns:
        A RunningStatistics object containing the summary statistic information of the query.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If unable to query the database
        java.io.IOException - If unable to read from the stream
